body:
# Kahlan - The PHP Test Framework
Kahlan is a BDD Framework for PHP 5.4+, a la RSpec/JSpec using a Jasmine style notation.

# Documentation

See the whole [documentation here](docs/README.md).

# Requirements

 * PHP 5.4+
 * Using an autoloader in your project (Composer for example)
 * Xdebug if you want to perform code coverage analysis.

# Screenshot

Example of output:
![Kahlan](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/crysalead/kahlan/master/docs/assets/kahlan.png)

# Installation

```
git clone git@github.com:crysalead/kahlan.git
cd kahlan
composer install
bin/kahlan              # to run specs or,
bin/kahlan --coverage=3 # to run specs with coverage info for namespaces, classes & methods (require xdebug)
```

# Special Note

If you think that the code coverage of this library is not enough to give it a go, keep in mind that PHPUnit is achieving [23.80% after more that 10 years of experience in tests](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/crysalead/kahlan/master/docs/assets/phpunit_4.4_code_coverage.png).
